mapper.select: SELECT STATION_CODE, BRAND, NAME, PRICE, DISTANCE, LATITUDE, LONGITUDE FROM GAS_STATIONS WHERE SQRT(POWER(LATITUDE - #{destinationLat}, 2) + POWER(LONGITUDE - #{destinationLng}, 2)) < 10 ORDER BY DISTANCE ASC, PRICE ASC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO USER_ROUTE_HISTORY ( UR_STOPOVER_NAME, UR_DEST_NAME, UR_DISTANCE, UR_CREATED_DATE, UR_CREATED_ID ) VALUES ( #{urStopoverName}, #{urDestName}, #{urDistance}, SYSDATE, #{urCreatedId} )
mapper.select: SELECT UR_STOPOVER_NAME AS urStopoverName, UR_DEST_NAME AS urDestName, UR_DISTANCE AS urDistance, UR_CREATED_DATE AS urCreatedDate, UR_CREATED_ID AS urCreatedId FROM USER_ROUTE_HISTORY WHERE UR_CREATED_ID = #{userId} ORDER BY UR_CREATED_DATE DESC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO CAM (CAM_LATITUDE, CAM_LONGITUDE, B_CREATED_DATE) VALUES (#{camLatitude}, #{camLongitude}, SYSDATE)
mapper.select: SELECT CAM_ID, CAM_LATITUDE, CAM_LONGITUDE FROM CAM
